message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product. It's designed to meet your specific needs and enhance your operations significantly. Considering its value and benefits, we're offering it to you for $14000. This price reflects our commitment to providing high-quality solutions while also allowing us to maintain a competitive edge in the market.
I'm really interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $13000. I'm willing to pay a bit more, but I need to stay within my budget.

Thank you for your interest in our product, Bob. I appreciate your willingness to pay more for it. After careful consideration, I am pleased to counteroffer at $13500. This price reflects the value of the product and allows us to maintain a fair margin. I believe this is a mutually beneficial solution.
I appreciate your flexibility, but I'm still a bit short on budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer $13200. This is the maximum I can go for this product.

I understand your situation, Bob, and I'm glad we're able to keep discussing this. To accommodate your budget, I propose a counteroffer of $13300 for the product. This price still maintains a reasonable margin for us while being competitive in the market.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but I'm getting close to my budget. I'm willing to meet you at $13000. This is my final offer.
Considering our previous discussions and your latest offer, I am willing to accept $13100 for the product. This price reflects a balance between our interests and allows for a fair transaction.
I'm willing to make a final push to meet in the middle. I'll offer $12900 for the product. This is my absolute limit.
Thank you for your persistence, Bob. I'm willing to accept $12950 for the product. This price is slightly above your last offer and maintains a reasonable margin for us.
I'm making a final push to meet my budget. I'll offer $12900 for the product. This is my last offer.
